attributes.review: I got this app because I wanted to support our beautiful wrinkly orange and the thing just kept crashing and I even had to go to the hospital because the amount of orange was so obnoxiously much it made my eyes bleed
attributes.title: Mannnn

attributes.review: I thought everyone was being delusional about the app but they weren’t wrong. The app verbal abused me. This is very sad, I expect better from the president 📉📉📉📉📉,this app made me emotional unstable. I suggest getting rid of this.
attributes.title: Very disappointed👁👄👁

attributes.review: For some reason the app does not want to open when I tap on it?? It locks me out right away. I’ve tried downloading it again but no luck!
attributes.title: Unreliable

attributes.review: I wanted to see more of our sexy orange president😍🤰🥳but every time I open the app my phone crashes🥺🥺I wish it would work😭😭😭but oh well I can just look at pictures of him on google🐸✌️
attributes.title: Poopy app

attributes.review: As soon as I got this app (it took forever to download) and it tracked my location and a few people came over trying to kill me!!! This app is absurd  and needs to get taken down.
attributes.title: I ALMOST DIED

attributes.review: First of all this app crashes a lot. I tried checking out what this whole thing was about and it logged me out twice. This app is trashhhhhhh it deserves 0 stars
attributes.title: Delete this app

attributes.review: The second I opened the app, I immediately deleted the because it was just that bad. This app doesn’t deserve to be created, let alone download by anyone on the planet. I give it a -5/5 rating.
attributes.title: This app is TRASH

attributes.review: I have had issues with this app in the past but now it just doesn’t work. I think we need to teach Donald how to form complete sentences again
attributes.title: Doesn’t work

attributes.review: This app is awful. Took forever (like days) to download and then kept crashing when i tried to open it. Deleted right away.
attributes.title: Boo

attributes.review: I was really excited to get this app! However when I opened it this huge orange with a face and a tiny fist filled my screen! Disgusting!! What is this? Annoying Orange made an app? I will be deleting this app as I now have to wash my eyes out.
attributes.title: TERIIBLE APP
